loading.cursorControls: W A S D or Directional arrows

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete?

intro.paragraph2: The Evil Giygas plans to destroy Earth
intro.paragraph3: But the chosen boy, alongside their friends he didn't meet yet
intro.paragraph4: Is the key to stop Giygas' plan
intro.paragraph5: However, there isn't much time left
intro.paragraph6: If {{protagonistName}} don't fight Giygas in the next 48 hours

talkTo.name: Talk to
talkTo.title: Who do you want to talk to?

bagOfFries.name: Bolsa de patatas fritas
bagOfFries.description: When eaten, you recover about 24 HP

breadRoll.name: Bread roll
breadRoll.description: When eaten, you recover about 30 HP

canOfFruitJuice.name: Can of fruit juice
canOfFruitJuice.description: If you drink this, you recover about 6 HP

cookie.name: Cookie
cookie.description: When eaten, you recover about 6 HP

cupOfCoffee.name: Cup of coffee
cupOfCoffee.description: If you drink this, you recover about 12 HP. I guess it tastes good to adults

hamburguer.name: Hamburguer
hamburguer.description: When eaten, you recover about 50 HP. 100% beef

mom.name: Mom
texts: I don't like the idea of you going out with all these perils out there.
But not everyday one can save the world.
So to help you I put a bit of {{favoriteFood}} to take out.
And remember to call your father once in a while.
You know he is always busy but he will be for you whenever you need him.
